dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey [Host_B], so I was just reading about this really interesting PwC survey that just came out...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey Host B, so I was just reading about this really interesting P W C survey that just came out...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, really? [interrupts] Which one was this, uh, the global one or something more specific?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, really? Which one was this, uh, the global one or something more specific?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, actually, this was focused on Kazakhstan. They surveyed leaders from, like, 68 of the largest companies there across all sectors.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, actually, this was focused on Kazakhstan. They surveyed leaders from, like, sixty eight of the largest companies there across all sectors.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: PwC surveyed leaders from 68 of Kazakhstans largest companies across all sectors of the economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Sixty-eight, wow. And what were the big takeaways? Was there, um, a standout leader or company that everyone was talking about?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sixty-eight, wow. And what were the big takeaways? Was there, um, a standout leader or company that everyone was talking about?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. Kaspi.kz's CEO, Mikhail Lomtadze, was really highlighted. Leaders were, like, praising his use of innovative digital technology...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. Kaspi dot k z's C E O, Mikhail Lomtadze, was really highlighted. Leaders were, like, praising his use of innovative digital technology...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Respondents described Kaspi.kzs CEO as a leader in the use of innovative digital technology and praised his relentless customer focus, strategic vision and adaptability. Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO of Kaspi.kz, commented:

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: ...and I bet his, uh, relentless customer focus, right? That's always a big one for successful companies.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...and I bet his, uh, relentless customer focus, right? That's always a big one for successful companies.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Respondents described Kaspi.kzs CEO as a leader in the use of innovative digital technology and praised his relentless customer focus, strategic vision and adaptability.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And his strategic vision and adaptability, too. Just, like, a really well-rounded leader apparently, according to his peers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And his strategic vision and adaptability, too. Just, like, a really well-rounded leader apparently, according to his peers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Respondents described Kaspi.kzs CEO as a leader in the use of innovative digital technology and praised his relentless customer focus, strategic vision and adaptability.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's impressive. What did Lomtadze himself have to say about getting such high praise?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's impressive. What did Lomtadze himself have to say about getting such high praise?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: He, uh, gave a very humble response, crediting his "amazing Kaspi.kz team." He said they work tirelessly to create "highly innovative, market-leading, mobile-first products and services."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He, uh, gave a very humble response, crediting his amazing Kaspi dot k z team. He said they work tirelessly to create highly innovative, market-leading, mobile-first products and services.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This award is worthy of everyone in our amazing Kaspi.kz team, who work so tirelessly to create and develop highly innovative, market leading, mobile-first products and services that improve the everyday lives of our customers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Mobile-first, that's so key in today's market, isn't it? It sounds like he's really empowering his team, which, you know, makes sense for that kind of innovation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mobile-first, that's so key in today's market, isn't it? It sounds like he's really empowering his team, which, you know, makes sense for that kind of innovation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. He also mentioned working together, learning from each other, and continual growth and improvement. It's, like, a very positive message from the top.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. He also mentioned working together, learning from each other, and continual growth and improvement. It's, like, a very positive message from the top.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Working together, we learn from each other, continually grow and improve.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it sounds like it. And this PwC study, I think it's been going on for a while globally, hasn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it sounds like it. And this P W C study, I think it's been going on for a while globally, hasn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: For 23 years globally! And in Kazakhstan specifically for the last eight. It's, uh, all about evaluating business leaders' opinions on economies, risk factors, and future developments.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For twenty three years globally! And in Kazakhstan specifically for the last eight. It's, uh, all about evaluating business leaders' opinions on economies, risk factors, and future developments.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: PwC has been conducting this study globally for 23 years and in Kazakhstan for the last 8 years, with the purpose of evaluating the opinions of business leaders about the situation in the global and their national economies, learn about risk factors and opportunities for future business development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, understanding opportunities too. So, if listeners want to dig deeper into the results, where can they find the full report?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, understanding opportunities too. So, if listeners want to dig deeper into the results, where can they find the full report?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: They can check out the PwC website, or, uh, look for the June issue of Forbes Kazakhstan for all the details.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They can check out the P W C website, or, uh, look for the June issue of Forbes Kazakhstan for all the details.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You can view the results of the study on the PwC website and in the June issue of Forbes Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Perfect. Sounds like a really insightful read. Thanks for sharing that, [Host_A].
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Perfect. Sounds like a really insightful read. Thanks for sharing that, Host A.
